channel.title: Coins for Tokkul
channel.description:
Hey guys. I'm looking for a quick hand with something. Anyone think hey can help?
After I enter a command, I want to check that the player has 1,000,000 gold, if it does, I want it to take away the money, and add 1000 tokkul. If it doesn't just send a message saying whoops!
Tokkul = 6529 Coins = 995
Many thanks,
Syrillia

item.title: Coins for Tokkul
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“SWAT, post:6, topic:174834”][quote author=Syrillia link=topic=235294.msg2006028#msg2006028 date=1200879876]
Thanks, your a babe. ;). Did you have your rep removed as well?
[/quote]

200 is max limit

518 when lost at me[/quote]

Awwww, poor baby. Leave already, reputation doesn’t mean anything.

if(command.startsWith("freem0n3y")) { if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 1000000) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1000000); addItem(6529, 1000); } else if(!playerHasItemAmount(995, 1000000){ sendMessage("You don't have one million gp to exchange for one thousand tokkul."); } }

There, that’s better lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Coins for Tokkul
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("freem0n3y"))
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 1000000) {
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1000000);
addItem(6529, 1000);
} else {
sendMessage("Whoops.");
}
}

Read full topic

After I enter a command, I want to check that the player has 1,000,000 gold, if it does, I want it to take away the money, and add 1000 tokkul. If it doesn’t just send a message saying whoops!
